headline: Rockwell Automation Introduces PointMax I/O to Empower Flexible Industrial System Design and Reduce Operational Complexity
summary: Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, today announced the release of PointMax™ I/O, a flexible remote input/output (I/O) system designed to help manufacturers tackle the growing complexity of modern industrial operations.

content.title: Rockwell Automation Introduces PointMax I/O to Empower Flexible Industrial System Design and Reduce Operational Complexity
content.summary: Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, today announced the release of PointMax™ I/O, a flexible remote input/output (I/O) system designed to help manufacturers tackle the growing complexity of modern industrial operations.
